sentences.en: Freezing weather in spring hampered the hens' ability to lay.
sentences.cn: 春天严寒的天气降低了母鸡的产蛋能力。

sentences.en: It is freezing outside, and put on your winter coat.
sentences.cn: 外面很冷, 穿上你的大衣吧.

sentences.en: It was freezing out there even in his buttoned-up overcoat.
sentences.cn: 外面非常冷，即使穿上大衣扣上扣子也不顶事。

sentences.en: It’s freezing in this house. Can’t I turn on the heating?
sentences.cn: 房子里冷极了，我不可以开暖气吗？

sentences.en: She hung on as the freezing, rushing water cascaded past her.
sentences.cn: 她抓得紧紧的，任凭冰冷湍急的水流从她身上倾泻而下。

sentences.en: The hospital is freezing staff appointments as part of its cutbacks.
sentences.cn: 这家医院冻结员工职位作为削减开支的一部分.

sentences.en: The temperature remained below freezing point throughout the day.
sentences.cn: 一整天气温都在零度以下。

sentences.en: These plants must be stored in the light at above freezing temperature.
sentences.cn: 这些植物必须放置于零度以上光照充足的地方。

sentences.en: They remain stranded in freezing weather and rapidly worsening conditions.
sentences.cn: 他们仍然被困着，天气严寒，情况迅速恶化。

sentences.en: We were freezing cold in the tent last night.
sentences.cn: 昨晚我们在帐篷里都冻僵了。

sentences.en: When everybody else is boiling hot, I'm freezing!
sentences.cn: 当其他所有人都酷热难耐时，我却冻得够呛！
